11 sizes baby to 12 years this is a cuff-to-cuff sweater crocheted flat we will start with making the ribbing for one cuff work the sleeve and increase then crochet the first section of the body the front & back sections to make room for the neck the second part of the body then the second sleeve while decreasing and then the final cuff this only needs two seams to become a sweater ✨ extra support & tips ✨ ✔️ video tutorials linked on youtube ✔️ join a community of crocheters ✔️ sweater schematic ✔️ diagram to guide you through each section ✨ what you will need to make this sweater ✨ yarn wecrochet upcycle worsted 1 - 33% alpaca 34% wool 33% acrylic 219yds/100g colorway shown sage weight 4 worsted yarn quantities 250 275 325 400 475 600 750 800 875 950 yds 2 2 2 2 3 3 4 4 5 balls yarn substitutions listed in pattern notions scissors 2 yarn needle 3 removable stitch marker 4 crochet hook h 5 0mm crochet hook 5 ✨ hey i m briana k ✨ join the autumn-inspired crochet along for a cozy crochet experience we ll be creating beautiful wearables together in the briana k community collection i ve designed this collection to be fun and easy with only 1-2 seams required you ll love the pretty aesthetic and perfect fit of these approachable pieces make them for yourself or as gifts i ve enjoyed creating items to match my nephew this season get ready to learn new crochet techniques and build a wardrobe full of warmth and style join me and let s crochet together for the entire collection visit https //brianakdesigns etsy com/listing/1606279143 6 -
